about_the_game:
Her Heart's Desire: A Landlord Epic Story:
With a past shrouded in mystery, you step into the role of a successful writer who's just had his first big break, selling a book to earn enough to become a home owner. Despite a massive drinking problem, you stay sober enough to place an ad for the spare bedrooms in your new home, and what luck, three gorgeous women apply to become your tenants! Daisy arrives first, fresh from the orphanage where she was kicked out on her birthday. Taking pity on the poor young woman, you celebrate with her the best way you can by getting her drunk. A gentleman wouldn't take advantage of the situation, but after she vomits into your toilet, it's game on.

The next day, while you need to continue working on your recently sold novel to wrap up the details, Lily and Rose arrive to sublet the other bedroom. Do they have deep, complicated backstories and rich personalities? No. Do they have incredible assets and the kind of smiles that make a dead soldier come back to life? Yes, yes they do. Get to know them, build up your like scores by selecting the best choice from the in-game menus, and get to know them intimately. As the story unfolds, you'll meet your book publisher, a sexy librarian, cheerleaders. The choice is yours whether to include them on your list of conquests, or focus on Daisy, Lily, and Rose.

Be careful with Daisy, since the unstable blonde moved in, it could be that scorning her is a fast ticket to getting your house burned down. Avoid the disaster, and choose which love interest to pursue in this light hearted adult visual novel.

What's in the game:

A simple narrative to explore with choices that influence the story.
More than 110,000 words of text, more than a full length novel.
3,600+ Crisp, beautiful images rendered in glorious HD.
Music and sound effects that deepen the experience.
43 fully animated adult scenes with unique animations with erotic sound effects that enhance the experience, easily accessible from the Replay feature.
Fetishes / tags - F solo, M/F, M/F/F, F/F, F/F/F, lesbian, oral, harem, vaginal, anal, group, squirt, toys, voyeurism, spanking, domination, corruption, humor, first person POV, pregnancy.
A good ending with each of the three love interests and a harem ending.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes explicit sexual content including: harem, anal, lesbian, threesome, group sex, creampies, facials, vaginal, oral, blowjob, double blowjob, doggystyle, missionary, woman-on-top, reverse cowgirl, and handjob.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Kernel 3.x+ distributions
  • Processor: 2.0ghz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9 or OpenGL ES 2 required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Only Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9 or OpenGL ES 2 required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Become a writer with a drinking problem and enjoy the debauchery when you rent out the spare bedrooms in your new house to three gorgeous women. Can you romance Daisy, Lily, and Rose? Find out in this farcical adult visual novel where you make the choices!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, French, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Dutch
